name: air_quality_health_index
description: Return the official air quality health index (1 to 10) bases on key parameters.The national AQHI is based on three-hour average concentrations of ground-level ozone (O3), nitrogen dioxide (NO2), and fine particulate matter (PM2.5). O3 and NO2 are measured in parts per billion (ppb) while PM2.5 is measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3)

O3.description: The ground-level ozone (O3) in parts per billion (ppb).in
O3.title: O3

NO2.description: The nitrogen dioxide (NO2), in parts per billion (ppb)
NO2.title: No2

PM.description: The fine particulate matter (PM2.5), PM2.5 is * measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3).
PM.title: Pm

name: tree_equivalent
description: Calculate how many trees it took to create paper.

unit.description: The unit (kg or lb) used for the weight
unit.title: Unit

name: traditional_hydro_to_carbon_footprint
description: Calculate CO2e from the use of traditional hydro provider

location.description: The country or continent providing the hydro. Can be any of USA, Canada, UK, Europe, Africa, LatinAmerica, MiddleEast, OtherCountry
location.title: Location

name: clean_hydro_to_carbon_footprint
description: Return the CO2e in Kg from the consumption of clean hydro energy

energy.description: The source of the clean energy. Can be Solar, Wind, HydroElectric, Biomass, Geothermal, Tidal or OtherCleanEnergy
energy.title: Energy

consumption.description: The amount of energy consumed in KWH..
consumption.title: Consumption

name: fuel_to_co2e
description: Transform liters of Diesel, Petrol or LPG into CO2 Equivalent in Kg.

type.description: The type can be Petrol, Diesel, LPG.
type.title: Type

litres.description: The number of litres to calculate from.
litres.title: Litres

name: carbon_footprint_from_car_travel
description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car

vehicle.description: The type of car, either SmallDieselCar, MediumDieselCar, LargeDieselCar, MediumHybridCar, LargeHybridCar, MediumLPGCar, LargeLPGCar, MediumCNGCar, LargeCNGCar, SmallPetrolVan, LargePetrolVan, SmallDielselVan, MediumDielselVan, LargeDielselVan, LPGVan, CNGVan, SmallPetrolCar, MediumPetrolCar, LargePetrolCar, SmallMotorBike, MediumMotorBike, LargeMotorBike
vehicle.title: Vehicle

name: carbon_footprint_from_flight
description: Calculate CO2e in Kg from a travel by air.

type.description: The type of flight, any of DomesticFlight, ShortEconomyClassFlight, ShortBusinessClassFlight, LongEconomyClassFlight, LongPremiumClassFlight, LongBusinessClassFlight, LongFirstClassFlight
type.title: Type

name: carbon_footprint_from_motor_bike
description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a motorbike travel

type.description: The type of motorbike, can be any of SmallMotorBike, MediumMotorBike, LargeMotorBike
type.title: Type

name: carbon_footprint_from_public_transit
description: Return CO2e in Kg from the use of public transporation.

type.description: The type of transportation, one of: Taxi, ClassicBus, EcoBus, Coach, NationalTrain, LightRail, Subway, FerryOnFoot, FerryInCar
type.title: Type
